Articles.Content: You go to 35 and find a sign saying \'stop with the stupid elevators\'.
You go to 36 and find Jeb trying to get back to kerbal.

Up, to 37.

You find an RPG-7.

You go up to 38.

You find a virtual reality simulator. You step in it and it\'s still level 38 of the skyscraper, but now completely redonculous things can happen.

You go up to level 39 in the virtual world, and interrupt an elephant opera during the ending high note. Because you did so, angry mobs of efficiently entitled elephants scream various insults at you while charging vigorously up the stairs of the opera house towards you.
The GLaDOS used to run the simulation explodes and you are thrown to floor 40.
You go to floor 0 and find infinity!
You go to level 41 and find that GlaDOS did not really explode, but instead lives on in a potato.
You go to level 42 and accidentally kick the GlaDOS power source over, breaking it. In your haste to fix it, you decide to use the GlaDOS potato to power the system.
You go to level 43 and you find the answer to life +1.

You go to level 44

You find a teleporter to space. It teleports the whole building, and somehow gave you a spacesuit.

You go to level 45

The building starts falling, and pants drift by.
You go to 46. You find a lever. You pull it and it starts raining mice.
You go to level 47. and you find a key and a memo with says: chamber 11 Level 48

You take the key and go to 48.

You find chamber 11.

You eat the key.
On level 48, you see space and scream out SPAAAAAACE!
You travel up a level, 49, and start to float because your out of gravity.

you go up to lvl 50 and Chuck norris finds you

oh, you also find a key to another damn chamber

You go up to level 51 and you open a door with that key you founded at level 50.

Its a secret escalator. and you go to level 52.....

You get to floor 52.

Chuck Norris catches up with you.

You are roundhouse kicked back to floor 42.

You get to floor 43 and yarr you find a pirate!

The pirate is trying to kill you, but suddenly you are affected by the Chuck Norris buff and you kickass the pirate.
The Chuck Norris powers thunder you straight up to lvl 44, not only do you kill all the zombies on that floor, you end up destroying the lvl43-44 stairs

You found a pack of ramen... It\'s tasty...

You see an EnderMan you haste one floor up (45), you take a liquid fuel tank and rig it on stairs...

Exploding noises :blaarg:
You go to 46 and realise you need to find ways to sneak around Chuck Norris, who is still on level 50.

go down one floor (45). You find a rocket.

You tried to launch it, but it exploded, knocking you back to (((x - 20) / 4) + 2)th floor.
